project1.title: Hangman Game -The Beatles Style:
project1.text:
A fun hangman style game with a twist! Help save The Beatles from Yoko Ono by guessing their song titles. 
 Features and interactive React app, butressed with Type Script. Use of React hooks, Json and more!

project2.title: 4 Mini React Projects:
project2.text: Four mini react projects that were created soley for working on different coding challenges. Fetures a Beats-Per-Minute counter, Color Theme Selector, Image Fetcher, and a Small Algo.

project3.title: Not Your Normal Tic-Tac-Toe:
project3.text: This Tic-Tac-Toe web-app is also styled as The Beatles vs Yoko - I think it's funny ;).  It features a flexable board size and rules, a Theme Toggle Option and Testing!
